mechanics.trigger: Creature is affected by Water Breathing
mechanics.condition: Creature is within range, caster can see creature, creature is willing, up to 10 creatures
mechanics.outcome: Creature gains the ability to breathe underwater

mechanics.trigger: Creature is affected by Water Breathing
mechanics.condition: Creature is affected by Water Breathing
mechanics.outcome: Creature retains its normal breathing pattern (can breathe air)

description_text: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures within range and you can see, the ability to breathe underwater until the end of its term. Affected creatures also retain their normal breathing pattern.
